title: ‘I Was Not Expecting These Good Legs’: Tadej Pogačar Upbeat Heading into GP Cycliste de Montréal
content:
Tour de France and Giro d'Italia champ Pogačar bullish after racing return, looks to Sunday's GP Cycliste de Montréal with heightened ambition.

Read the full article at ‘I Was Not Expecting These Good Legs’: Tadej Pogačar Upbeat Heading into GP Cycliste de Montréal on Velo.
author: sstokes
